jtxt.emulator

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • jtxt.emulator.Location

  • public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
    A place where text can be inserted within the buffer.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int line
      The line that this location represents in the terminal.
      int position
      The position within the line that this location represents within the terminal.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Location(int line, int position)
      Creates a new location with the given line and position.
      Location(Location loc)
      Creates a new location with the same line and position as the given location.

      • advanceForward

        public void advanceForward(int amount)
        Increases the position of this Location by the given amount.
        Parameters:
        amount - The number of spaces to advance forward.

      • inside

        public boolean inside(Region bounds)
        Determines whether this location is within the given region.
        Parameters:
        bounds - The region that this location should be within.
        Returns:
        True if this location is within the bounds, and false if it lies outside of it.

      • at

        public static Location at(Region bounds,
                          int line,
                          int position)
        Creates and returns a new Location, verifying that the indices are valid coordinates for the bounds which have been given.
        Parameters:
        bounds - The bounds to verify against the coordinates for the new Location.
        line - The line of the new Location.
        position - The position of the new Location.
        Returns:
        A new Location if the coordinates are within the bounds.
